charges.charge_description: FALSE REPRESENTATION TO BE CITIZEN OF THE UNITED STATES . PENALTY : 0-3 YEARS AND /OR $ 250,000.00 , $ 100.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT . 1 YEAR TERM OF SUPERVISED RELEASE.(1)
FALSE STATEMENT OT FEDERAL AGENCY OR AGENT .    PENALTY: 0-5 YEARS AND / OR $ 250,000.00 FINE OR BOTH , $100.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT . 3 YEAR TERM OF SUPERVISED RELEASE.(2)
MISUSE OF PASSPORT .    PENALTY: 0-10 YEARS AND / OR $ 250,000.00 FINE OR BOTH , $ 100.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT . 3 YEAR TERM OF SUPERVISED RELEASE.(3)

18 &; 911, 1001, 1544 :   Willfully &; Knowingly use or attempt to use any passport issued or designed for use of another. Citizen &; national of Mexico declared to be a U.S. Citizen &; to substantiate his claim presented a U.S. Passport bearing the photograph &; name of another person when in fact knew that such name and passport was not his/hers .
